result.arabic_text: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
result.translation: 2. Toysa korosey isin baaxô bagul amaanah anuk gexa affara Alsih gide, diggah isin Yallih digaalak assaqqe waytaanam ixiga, diggah Yalli koroosite mara xixxibise kinni.
